meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a cult.
meanings.sent1: The mysterious leader had a culty influence over his followers.
meanings.sent2: The culty rituals were shrouded in secrecy.
meanings.sent3: The culty decorations at the party gave it an eerie vibe.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes had a culty intensity that drew people in.
meanings.sent5: The culty atmosphere in the room made me feel uneasy.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics associated with a cult.
meanings.sent1: The culty behavior of the group raised suspicions.
meanings.sent2: The culty leader demanded unwavering loyalty.
meanings.sent3: The culty fashion trend swept through the school.
meanings.sent4: His culty charm captivated everyone he met.
meanings.sent5: The culty symbols on the wall added to the mysterious aura.

meanings.definition: Tending to attract or involve people in a cult-like manner.
meanings.sent1: The charismatic speaker had a culty following.
meanings.sent2: The movie had a culty following among horror fans.
meanings.sent3: The new app's culty design drew users in.
meanings.sent4: Her music had a culty appeal that resonated with listeners.
meanings.sent5: The culty marketing campaign created a buzz around the product.
